directions: Bring chicken broth to a boil in a large pot. Stir chicken, celery, carrots, onion, barley, rice, salt, and pepper into broth. Reduce heat to medium-high and cook until chicken and rice are cooked through, about 20 minutes. Adjust salt and pepper to taste.
ingredients: 2 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves, chopped
salt and ground black pepper to taste
title: Quick Easy Chicken Barley Soup
